meanings.definition: A useful or valuable thing, person, or quality.
meanings.sent1: Her positive attitude is her greatest asset.
meanings.sent2: The company's most valuable asset is its loyal customers.
meanings.sent3: His ability to make people laugh is a real asset in social situations.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of chaos, her calming presence is a true asset.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map was their only asset in finding the hidden gold.

meanings.definition: A valuable item or property owned by a person or company.
meanings.sent1: The house was listed as their main asset in the will.
meanings.sent2: Investing in real estate can be a smart way to acquire assets.
meanings.sent3: His vintage car collection is not just a hobby but also a valuable asset.
meanings.sent4: To him, knowledge was the most precious asset one could possess.
meanings.sent5: The antique vase was the family's most prized asset.
